project.name: Alfresco Client
project.description: Alfresco Client generic POM file for Maven builds

instructions.Import-Package:
META-INF.cxf, org.apache.cxf.bus.spring;version=${cxf.version}, org.apache.cxf.bus.*;version=${cxf.version}, org.apache.cxf.*;version=${cxf.version}, org.apache.activemq.*;version=${activemq.version}, org.apache.camel.*;version=${camel.version}, com.fasterxml.jackson.*;version="[${fasterxml.jackson.version}, ${jackson2.version}]", org.springframework.*;version="[${org.springframework.security.version}, ${org.springframework.version}]", org.apache.wss4j.*;version=${wss4j.version}, org.eclipse.jetty.*;version=${org.eclipse.jetty.version},
!org.osgi.*, !org.apache.commons.logging, !org.apache.commons.logging.*,
org.apache.log4j.*,
javax.sql;resolution:=optional, javax.sql.*;resolution:=optional, javax.servlet;version=${javax.servlet.version};resolution:=optional, javax.servlet.*;version=${javax.servlet.version};resolution:=optional, javax.net.ssl;resolution:=optional, javax.net.ssl.*;resolution:=optional, javax.net.*;resolution:=optional,
javax.mail.*;resolution:=optional, javax.xml.*;resolution:=optional, javax.activation;resolution:=optional, javax.activation.*;resolution:=optional, org.w3c.*;resolution:=optional, org.xml.*;resolution:=optional, sun.misc;resolution:=optional,
instructions.DynamicImport-Package:
javax.security.*;resolution:=optional, javax.security.auth;resolution:=optional, javax.security.auth.*;resolution:=optional,
javax.smartcardio;resolution:=optional, javax.smartcardio.*;resolution:=optional, com.sun.xml;resolution:=optional, com.sun.xml.*;resolution:=optional, com.sun.mail.*;resolution:=optional, com.sun.security;resolution:=optional, com.sun.security.*;resolution:=optional, javax.persistence;resolution:=optional,
javax.ws.rs;resolution:=optional;version="[2.0,3)", javax.ws.rs.core;resolution:=optional;version="[2.0,3)", javax.ws.rs.*;resolution:=optional;version="[2.0,3)",
